episode_event_easter_2021/4001_0301_0200: I’m looking forward to the egg hunt!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_0401_0300: Right?! I’m looking forward to it, too!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_0600: Lopunny is super excited as well!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_0700:
I guess that’s natural. We worked hard together
to get this event ready!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_0800: All right! Let’s head over to where Burgh is!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1000:
I see you matched your outfit with Lopunny! It
looks great!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1100:
Oh, before I forget, I’m on my way to meet up
with Barry...
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1200:
I was wondering if you wanted to join us. We
haven’t battled each other in so long.
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1300:
Sorry, I’d love to, but I’m in charge of running
the egg hunt!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1400:
I know! Why don’t you participate, too? It’s bound
to be a lot of fun!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1500: An egg hunt? What’s that all about?
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1600:
You’ll see when you get there! But I gotta get
going now!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1700:
Aw, man... And here I thought we might be able
to have a battle!
episode_event_easter_2021/4001_1001_1800: But I guess I can check out this egg hunt...
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0100: Oh no, not good. Not good at all...
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0200:
For now, I’ll pass on instructions to my staff.
I’ll leave the rest to you.
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0300: There you are! I’ve been waiting for you!
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0500: Waaah! Waaah! My Egg is gone!
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0600: Oh dear... It’s OK. You don’t have to cry.
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0800:
We’ve run into a little problem. Looks like there
was a bit of a mishap...
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_0900:
Somehow, a real Pokémon Egg got lost among
the fake decorated eggs we’ve hidden for the
egg hunt!
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_1000:
Wait, so a real Egg got mixed in with the fake
ones? How in the world did that happen?
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_1100:
The eggs we’re using for the egg hunt already got
distributed around Pasio. I think that’s when the
mix-up happened.
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_1200: Don’t cry... I’ll help you find your Egg!
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_1500:
It’s too late to cancel the event, but at the same
time, it would be dangerous if someone took a
real Egg home...
episode_event_easter_2021/4002_1001_1900: I have just the thing for that!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0100:
Hello, everyone! Thank you for participating in our
Egg-Hunting Eggstravaganza!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0200:
We’ve hidden a bunch of eggs around Pasio. Try
to find as many as you can!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0300:
We’ve also prepared an eggstra-special surprise
for you all to enjoy!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0500:
Among the many eggs we’ve hidden, one is a real
Pokémon Egg!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0600: The lucky person who finds that Egg...
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0700: will receive one of my newest art creations!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_0900: I want it! I want it so bad!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1100: You didn’t tell us anything about this!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1200:
It’ll be just fine! This won’t cause problems
for anyone.
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1300: And this way, we’ll find that Egg in no time!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1400: Everyone, on your marks... Get set... Go!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1500: I’m glad everyone’s so into it!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1800: I’m the one who’s gonna find that Egg!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_1900:
Not if I find it first! I’m gonna use all my
fieldwork experience to track it down!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2100: Oh, I wanted to ask you. After the egg hunt—
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2200:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! May! Let’s get going,
you two!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2300: Oh, looks like he’s done with the intro.
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2400: We gotta go! Good luck, Brendan!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2600:
You sure it’s OK to let her go without getting a
promise to battle?
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2700: Well...she’s busy, so it’ll have to wait.
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_2800: I guess so, but at this rate...
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3000:
Well...I saw May when she was preparing for this
event, doing her surveys of the grassy areas and
all that...
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3100:
And she was smiling a lot more than when I’ve
seen her battling...
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3200:
Maybe she’s gonna stop being a Trainer and give
up battling for good to focus on fieldwork!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3400:
May would never quit being a Trainer and
stop battling...
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3500:
I mean, I dunno. But her dad is a Pokémon
Professor, y’know? I’m just saying, it could
happen! Maybe!
episode_event_easter_2021/4003_1001_3700: (No, you wouldn’t do that...would you, May?)
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_0100: So nobody found that Egg yet...
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_0200:
I hate to admit it, but our chances of finding it
aren’t looking too good...
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_0400:
Er... Actually, we’ve still got plenty of time! I’ll 
go take a look around myself!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_0500: Where in the world could that Egg be?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_0900: This is the Egg you were looking for, right?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_1100: What a big help! Thank you so much!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_1200:
As promised, I’ll present you with a brand-new
piece of art designed by yours truly!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_1300:
Burgh, I appreciate the gesture...but could I ask
you for something else instead?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_1900:
I can tell that you’re asking for this because
something else is bugging you... Very well, then!
Let’s do it!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_2000:
I’d be happy to join, too. How about
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_2600: Remember how fun it is to battle!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_2900: Argh, we lost! But I had so much fun!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3000: Did you have fun, too, May?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3100: Of course! It’s always fun to battle you, Brendan!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3300:
So...does that mean you’re not gonna stop
being a Trainer or give up battling for good?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3400:
Give up battling?! Stop being a Trainer?!
What are you talking about?!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3600: I see. So that’s what was bugging you.
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3700:
Whaaat?! You mean that was just me totally
misreading the situation?!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3800: Yeah! Don’t just make things up like that!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_3900:
So, you really weren’t planning to stop being a
Trainer after all?
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_4100:
I mean...I do think I might want to be a Pokémon
Professor one day, just like my dad!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_4200: But that’s way far into the future!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_4300:
And if I ever have to make that decision, you’ll be
the first person I talk to, Brendan!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5100: It reminds me of all of you.
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5200:
In the same way this baby Eevee has limitless
potential, who knows what the future has in store
for you all.
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5300: You might continue down your paths as Trainers...
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5500: or even become artists like me!
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5600: But right now, it’s fine for Eevee to just be Eevee.
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5700:
In the same way, you kids should keep having fun
with your friends, growing as individuals, and
preparing for your futures...
episode_event_easter_2021/4004_1001_5800: no matter where life takes you!
